title: Homing Instinct
description: Carrie Adams, successful television producer, mother and wife, is about to return to work. Carrie is desperate to reinvent herself from housewife to svelte career womanâ€”because this is what today's women do, don't they? But she isn't happy, the children aren't happy, and her husband Mike is becoming more and more detached from family life. She begins to think that perhaps this isn't the right choice for her.
author: Diana Appleyard
